  ┃  # 4-character prompt handling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12,343  6% ($0.00) v1.1.53
  ┃

  ┃
  ┃  Reply with exactly: 4
  ┃

  ┃  Thinking: The user is asking me to reply with exactly "4". This is a simple request.

     4

     ▣  Build · big-pickle · 5.3s
